document_data.caption: A map showing the High Country in Rashemen.
document_data.name: High Country (Rashemen)
document_data.mainbody: The '''High Country''' was a range of hills found in the nation of [[Rashemen]].
document_data.Description: Resonating with old [[magic]], the High Country was said to be a place of unusual happenings and evil beasts. The peaks and hills were intercut by scores of small valleys that wound in between them. Many of the crests were dotted with magical stone [[menhir]]s that dated back to the ancient [[Raumathar]]i empire.

Geography.Flora & Fauna: A great number of wild predators such as [[wolves]], [[snow tiger]]s, and even [[winter wolves]] roamed the hills, occasionally working in concert with the local [[goblin]]s and [[troll]]s.

document_data.Rumors & Legends: Legend stated that the stone monoliths found in the High Country were once used to imprison [[demon]]s from [[Narfell]].
document_data.Notable Locations: One local tale spoke of a man wandering the countryside who encountered one of the [[spirit]]s of the High Country, only to learn the apparition was once a [[Rashemaar]] soldier who only wanted to a consoling word to his grieving widow.

Inhabitants.Notable Inhabitants:
* [[Hurrahesh]], an intelligent and particularly strong winter wolf.
* [[Kissethkashaan]], a great and mighty [[white dragon]].
* [[Nanraak|King Nanraak]], chieftain of the region's greatest tribe of goblins.
* [[Tekun|Tekun the Warlord]], the High Country's most feared kobold ruler.
